类型: Color: Men Watch-Gold Steel Band with Black Face
评论详情: (This is an unsponsored, unbiased review)  I was looking for a gold-colored watch. Nothing fancy with all the bells, whistles, dials and other overly complicated things that watches nowadays have.  Simple, elegant, inexpensive, handsome, quartz movement and gold colored.  Olevs nailed it!  In the box is the watch, link removal tool, instructions to set the time, day and date and some padding to keep the watch secure in transit, or to store the watch when you aren't using it. The battery is already installed, so removing the clasp from the crown is all you need to get rolling.  The watch is sturdy and have some decent weight to it. The links rattle a little bit, but for the price, I'll overlook that.  The black watch face really highlights the gold notes, and is really stunning.  I wear this watch to work when all suited-up, and it definitely makes a statement of class.  So far, after a few weeks, time is holding accurately.  So, let me add this. It's not the price, but the value obtained from what you purchase. For me, this is a high-value item that adds class to my work dress, which is what I needed this watch to be. Goes well with gold cufflinks.  Very satisfied customer here!

评论详情: I wasn’t expecting much, but disappointed at how inexpensive (cheap), this is.  Was hoping that the band was stainless steel, but do not believe it is.  Because it being toy like, it is difficult to set day/date /time.  Had no problem with the band size, it just feels very cheap.  Will probably give it to a grandson.  I have seen some very nice knock-offs out of China for not much money and was hoping this would be like that, but it's really not.  The pictures are good, but not sure I would want to wear it in public.  Disappointing!!!, however it was only $30.

类型: Color: Men Watch-Black Steel Band with Blue Face
评论详情: Cheap as cheap can get. The watches you get from kohls are made better. Within 5 minutes all the tools that come with it to remove links were broke or bent. Or the tool itself came apart. Save your money and get something better quality!

评论概述: Cheap price means Cheap watch. Still not cheap enough.
类型: Color: Men Watch-Gold Steel Band with Black Face
评论详情: So at $40 you cant expect much out of a watch. For the price the face looks nice. The bracelet is made from a very cheap pot metal. The pins are a pain to get out because A. the tool is cheap (what do you expect at this price) and B. not all the holes are even round and the tool has to push through that before it can start to push the pin. If you lay the bracelet flat on the tool, the hole will not be lined up. You have to be very careful that it is lined up straight before you tighten it too much.  I will give it 2 stars because my expectations were already low for such a cheap watch, but $40 is still too much. This exact watch can be found for $10 on AliExpress. Not to mention it is trying to be a Rolex copy with the crown and name - OLEvs, rOLEx. I can't bring myself to actually wear it but it gave me an idea of sizing when i purchased a decent watch. Wish i saw it on AliExpress first though.

类型: Color: Men Watch-Black Steel Band with Blue Face
评论详情: My favorite watch's band broke. So, I went looking for a watch with NO CLASP; a stretch-able metal band. Over 30 minutes of going through the watches and FINALLY one with no mention of a clasp, no visible clasp in the photos, and no clasp in the illustration of how to adjust the band. I order it and I have to admit, it's an attractive watch. WITH A CLASP IN THE BAND. So, I went to a local jeweler and ordered a replacement band for my favorite watch. The band cost about as much as this watch but it is what I really wanted when I bought this watch. I should have known better because I've been noticing that all too frequently, Amazon's illustrations do not match the product description.

评论概述: You have to be a craftsman to begin with!
